class  isis::util::PropertyMap
 This class contains a mapping tree to store all kinds of properties (path/key : value) It's also a generic class to have the probability to handle different modalities in upper levels (in our special case we'll have to handle things like images or other time series of data each having different properties in its standard or wherever from). More...
